_source.short_desc: Fluix is a platform to streamline the document flow and communication between your mobile workforce, customers and back office.
_source.long_desc:
Fluix is a no-code, simple-to-use software solution that helps companies to digitize documents and automate routine tasks, all in one place.
We solve the pain points of office and field teams who want to deliver faster and gather secure, reliable data while keeping safety and compliance as top priorities.

Fluix can be accessed through its native app for iOS, Android or any web browser.
Help your team become more productive and make your business more efficient. 
FOR TEAMS OF 10+ USERS.
_source.pricing_details: Fluix offers the main Core plan of $30/user/month and a couple of add-ons based on the needs of particular companies.
_source.target_audience: Fluix is best for companies with 10+ members of the mobile workforce who are looking to streamline the document flow and business processes between the field teams, customers and office managers.

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Drag & Drop
category_features.definition: Click and object and drag and drop through an interface

category_features.definition: Create and design new forms from scratch using templates and design tools, or scan and convert existing forms into the system

category_features.definition: Look through entire documents, not just sections

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflow

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.definition: Detects when a user has input/keyed data incorrectly

category_features.definition: Detects variations in pronunciation or variations in spelling across regions.

related_products.short_desc: Create forms easily and turn responses into workflows on monday.com's open platform so your team can handle requests all in one place.
related_products.features: Digitize your forms and turn responses into workflows easily with monday.com's open platform without any coding. Create forms in minutes with pre-made templates, and share a link to get responses from non-devs, clients, or customers. Compile responses into a visual board if you need to track the status of open tickets in one place. Or, generate reports from replies to make better decisions about your priorities. Then add automations to offload repetitive tasks and streamline the entire process.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: UpKeep is rated the #1 mobile-first Forms Automation Software to streamline work orders, facility, and asset management.
related_products.features: UpKeep's Forms Automation Software is rated the #1 mobile-first maintenance and asset management solution for your team. From your desktop to your phone and even your tablet, UpKeep is easily accessible from anywhere at any time. Create work orders on-the-go, get notifications when tasks are updated, and receive alerts straight from your app when assets go down making your business run more efficiently than ever before.

related_products.short_desc: Ideal for businesses of all sizes, it is a form building tool that helps users create survey forms while also reviewing submissions.
related_products.features: Trusted by over 10 million users, Jotform's form builder is the easy way to create and publish online forms from any device. The company offers 10,000+ ready-made form templates, 100+ integrations to 3rd party apps, and advanced design features making it the leading online form builder for organizations all over the world. It's popularly used to create payment forms, lead generation forms, registration forms, contact forms, application forms, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Teams in nearly every department across your organization can now easily create and share forms or rmbed them on your website
related_products.features:
PandaDoc created PandaDoc Forms for a number of teams like Sales, HR, Operations, Legal, and more. Easily create and share a Form by embedding it on your website or share the Form via a direct link. Zero coding required and you don?t even need a customer?s email address. 
Features like editable templates, specific signing order, and payments are also available for Forms. 
We?re pretty confident PandaDoc Forms will be the easiest form builder you?ll ever use.

related_products.short_desc: An all-in-one online PDF editor, built-in e-signature and fillable form builder.
related_products.features: pdfFiller is a GDPR compliant online PDF editor, e-signature manager and fillable PDF form builder in a single web app. Edit and e-sign PDF documents online, create fillable PDF forms and send them for signing. Share documents via email, social media or host them on your company's website. Fax, print or send PDFs via USPS right from your pdfFiller  account. Get completed copies of submitted and signed PDF forms and automatically extract data to an Excel file, CRM or database.

related_products.short_desc: Pardot's lead management features CRM integration, email marketing, lead nurturing, lead scoring, and ROI reporting.
related_products.features: Pardot empowers marketing and sales teams to work together to engage buyers, close deals, and grow relationships. Pardot's lead management features CRM integration, email marketing, lead nurturing, lead scoring, and ROI reporting to help marketing and sales teams work together to generate and qualify sales leads, shorten sales cycles, and track marketing ROI. Users can track all prospects on a site, qualify sales leads, and utilize social selling.

related_products.short_desc: Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams.
related_products.features:
Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams. We help teams share their core processes, then transform them into powerful no-code workflows.

Start with employee onboarding to set up new hires for success, then build all sorts of workflows like employee onboarding, client onboarding, and tenant screening.

Manage your team wiki and company handbook 100% free.

Join Salesforce, Colliers, Drift, and 3,000+ other businesses who use Process Street today.

related_products.short_desc: Twilio SendGrid is the leading cloud-based email delivery platform, trusted by over 80,000 of the world's fastest-growing brands.
related_products.features:
Twilio SendGrid is a leader in customer communications. Our trusted, cloud-based email delivery platform helps marketers and developers send with confidence. We are trusted by over 80,000 global customers, big and small, to drive engagement and growth through their email program.

In addition to our award-winning API, Twilio SendGrid's Marketing Campaigns offers powerful, one-to-many sending, straightforward segmentation, flexible and frustration-free campaign editing and actionable analytics.

related_products.short_desc: Easy-to-make forms that are fully automated while also fun and conversational.
related_products.features: Create stylish forms with automatically generated reports and useful insights. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps let you automate your workflow and send collected data wherever you need it to be. Typeforms are responsive and fully customizable to your brand, giving a personalized experience while also being fully automated. The easy form builder means you can build and launch one in minutes, and it's all protected with enterprise-level security.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is #1 free form builder used by over 8 million companies worldwide. External (website) and internal (requests) forms.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is #1 free form builder used by over 8 million companies worldwide. External (website) and internal (requests) forms. Natively integrated with Bitrix24 CRM and form automation features.

similar_products.short_desc: ProntoForms make real-time, accurate data collection quick and easy. Automate your business processes with robust mobile forms.
similar_products.features: Empower your field employees to reliably complete complex inspections, audits, and other tasks on the first visit. ProntoForms is the leader in enterprise-grade mobile forms. Our forms automation solution is easy to deploy and scalable. ProntoForms' no-code solution integrates seamlessly with your back-office systems and cloud services. Trust us to help you make real-time, accurate data collection fast and easy, even offline.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

similar_products.short_desc: Launch, manage, measure, and grow your grants and social impact programs with Submittable's intuitive, flexible cloud-based platform.
similar_products.features: Submittable powers you with tools to launch, measure, and grow your social impact programs, locally and globally. From grants and corporate social responsibility programs to awards and scholarships. The start-to-finish platform makes your workflow smarter and more efficient, leading to better decisions and bigger impact. Easily report on success, and learn for the future-Submittable is flexible and powerful enough to grow alongside your programs.

similar_products.short_desc: Start a FREE TRIAL and join 25K orgs that use our no-code form builder to automate critical workflows. Plans start at $50/month.
similar_products.features: Join more than 25K orgs with a FREE TRIAL of Formstack Forms, a drag-and-drop online form builder, and reach optimal digital maturity as described in the 2022 State of Digital Maturity: Advancing Workflow Automation report. Save up to 18 hrs per week by enabling anyone in your org to create online forms, collect data, and automate processes without code. We support HIPAA compliance and offer 100s of templates + integrations for apps like Salesforce, MailChimp, and PayPal. Plans start at $50/mo.

similar_products.short_desc: Enables anyone to build web forms, workflow applications, surveys and detailed reporting without writing any code.
similar_products.features: PerfectForms is a feature-rich, web-based development environment - complete with pixel-perfect forms, form automation and powerful reporting capabilities - that lets you quickly build and deploy a wide variety of business applications, all without writing a single line of code.  You can build engaging, visually rich forms, design simple or complex workflows, send automatic notifications and escalations, create impressive drill-down reports, and even integrate with external systems.

similar_products.short_desc: FastField is an extremely flexible mobile forms solution to collect data and automate your digital forms workflow.
similar_products.features: FastField is a mobile forms automation solution for efficient and accurate data collection. FastField allows for offline data capture to achieve a completely paperless workflow. Build highly customizable digital forms for Android, iOS and Web without any prior coding experience. FastField is ideal for audits, inspections, safety reports, and any other custom business forms. With FastField you can integrate proprietary data to pre-populate forms and automatically deliver custom reports.

similar_products.short_desc: The simplest eSign & document completion solution for businesses that demand fast signatures, form building and  document collections
similar_products.features:
***Ideal for Consumer (B2C) focused businesses ***
*Dear Students - we do not have student plans. We do not provide affiliate links*

Highest eSign, and eForm Automation completion rate. 

Instantly collect eSignatures, build HTML forms (eForms), supporting documents, while on a call. 

With ad-hoc documents, or pre-formatted templates.

Via text/SMS or email (eliminate needless 'envelope' expense)- get e-Signatures on the spot.

Use through API or stand-alone. Integrations including Salesforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Ideal for businesses of all sizes, it is a form building tool that helps users create survey forms while also reviewing submissions.
similar_products.features: Trusted by over 10 million users, Jotform's form builder is the easy way to create and publish online forms from any device. The company offers 10,000+ ready-made form templates, 100+ integrations to 3rd party apps, and advanced design features making it the leading online form builder for organizations all over the world. It's popularly used to create payment forms, lead generation forms, registration forms, contact forms, application forms, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile app for completing inspections, audits, safety reports, orders, and many other tasks. Easy to use, enterprise grade.
similar_products.features:
Forms On Fire is your mobile app for accurate inspections, audits, safety reports, orders, and many other tasks.

Save time with pre-filled fields using data from your systems. Save time by eliminating travel back to the office. Save 100% of the time it takes to re-enter, re-assemble, file, and distribute forms to those who need them.

With enterprise-grade security, connections to thousands of systems, and ridiculously helpful customer service, you will delight your management team.

similar_products.short_desc: Free online form builder with advanced capabilities that are sophisticated enough for developers, yet simple enough for novices.
similar_products.features: Cognito Forms is an advanced online form builder that boasts an intuitive, user-friendly interface and the most robust set of free features on the market. Designed from the ground up for today's Internet, the platform delivers extremely powerful features; including document merging, file uploads, repeating sections, save & resume, conditional logic, and integrated payments. Seamlessly embed your forms onto your website, and get notified via email whenever new entries are submitted.

similar_products.short_desc: Collect data quickly and accurately with smart and intuitive digital forms using the Mobile Impact Platform.
similar_products.features: Collect data quickly and accurately right from the start with digital forms using the Mobile Impact Platform. Build highly customizable digital forms for Android, iOS, and Web - no coding experience required. Preload your relevant data and quickly capture text, photos, barcodes, GPS coordinates, voice, signatures, and more. Streamline your process today to increase efficiency, reduce processing time, and improve accuracy.

similar_products.short_desc: Switch on forms automation for legal professionals with Thomson Reuters? HighQ.
similar_products.features: HighQ's modern, adaptable, and continuously-learning legal workflow platform delivers an open and scalable foundation, embedded machine intelligence and analytics, and smart integration points with firm-critical applications. Dramatically improve how you plan, organize, track, and complete work more efficiently with personalized client portals and real-time access and insights on legal project work, ready-to-use task lists and templates, and automated workflow-enabled legal process maps.

similar_products.short_desc: With over two million landing pages at an average conversion rate of over 16%, Instapage is helping leading brands across 100 countries
similar_products.features: Instapage is the world's most advanced landing page platform, helping digital advertisers create more relevant and impactful advertising by making it easy to build conversion-optimized landing pages in minutes. With Instapage, marketers can maximize conversions by creating, personalizing, optimizing landing pages at scale, automatically connecting ads with relevant post-click pages, and delivering insights to drive the highest growth possible from digital ad campaigns.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Process Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Process Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Process Management software enables companies to model, deploy, optimize, and manage business processes. Business Process Management solutions offer a collaborative, continuous conduit through which to institute changes and distribute information throughout an enterprise. Organizations use these applications to coordinate their business environment, schedule and synchronize changes, test the effectiveness of new strategies, and institutionalize best practices. Business Process Management software is related to Systems Integration software and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contract Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contract Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contract Management software automates the creation, tracking, and monitoring of contracts and agreements. Contract Management software also allows for the company-wide sharing of contract documents and management of differing document versions. These contract management applications often provide top-down control and monitoring of contract status, key dates, and personnel responsibilities. Contract Management software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Document Management software automates the process of managing documents from creation to storage to distribution throughout an enterprise, increasing efficiency and reducing the cost and clutter of maintaining paper records. Document Management applications provide solutions for a wide range of document needs from low specificity, high volume items such as standard forms to highly specific, low volume items such as one-to-one correspondence. Document Management software is related to Digital IT Asset Management software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top PDF Editor software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of PDF Editor tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: PDF Editor software can be used to create, edit, convert, and share PDF documents. The software allows users to edit text and images within PDFs, rearrange pages, password-protect files, electronically sign forms, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.

Fluix is a no-code, simple-to-use software solution that helps companies to digitize documents and automate routine tasks, all in one place.
We solve the pain points of office and field teams who want to deliver faster and gather secure, reliable data while keeping safety and compliance as top priorities.

Fluix can be accessed through its native app for iOS, or any web browser.
Help your team become more productive and make your business more efficient. 
FOR TEAMS OF 10+ USERS.

category_features.name: Mobile Signature Capture
category_features.definition: Capture a signature via a mobile device

category_features.name: Multi-Party Signing
category_features.definition: Share documents to multiple users to collect multiple signatures in a serial, parallel or combination order.

category_features.name: Reminders
category_features.definition: Set notifications to remind users when to view and sign documents

category_features.name: Task Progress Tracking
category_features.definition: Measurement and reporting of task milestones

related_products.short_desc: Easily store and share cloud content from Google Docs, Microsoft Office files, alongside traditional files in Dropbox.
related_products.features: Easily store and share cloud content from Google Docs, Microsoft Office files, alongside traditional files in Dropbox?making it easy to manage all your important files. Dropbox Business is a digital workplace trusted by over 300,000 business teams worldwide and over 50% of the Fortune 500 for its industry leading file sync, collaboration, and extensive administration and security features that scale as teams grow.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your content lifecycle with flexible retention schedules, preservation for defensible discovery, and disposition management.
related_products.features: Upgrade your information governance strategy with the in-place lifecycle management your organization needs to reduce risk without impacting productivity. Streamline how you manage the lifecycle of the content that powers business processes with flexible retention schedules, preservation for defensible discovery, and disposition management.

related_products.short_desc: monday.com Work OS enables easy creation, centralizing, tracking, and automation of all document processes in your organization.
related_products.features: With monday.com Work OS you can create, store, and manage all documents and forms in one place. Automate document creation and approvals to increase efficiency and minimize error, share and collaborate on documents in real-time, and maximize security by centralizing them in one place. Track and review past edits through document search, and standardize document processes to keep everyone on your team on the same page. monday allows for efficient document management, in a collaborative workspace.

related_products.short_desc: Confluence can be your single source of truth. Use this tool to efficiently store and share information across your whole organization.
related_products.features: Organizations are getting increasingly digital. Gone are the days where we would keep paper files on important documents. Join the digital movement by making Confluence your one Document Management software tool. Become more efficient by building a single source of truth and distributing important information across your organization, with one click.

related_products.short_desc: Confluence can be your single source of truth. Use this tool to efficiently store and share information across your whole organization.

Become more efficient by building a single source of truth and distributing important information across your organization, with one click.

related_products.short_desc: Work off the latest documents every time. Autodesk Takeoff is built on a cloud-based platform that updates in real time.
related_products.features: Collaborate confidently knowing you have access to the latest documents and data whenever you need them. Get simplified access to relevant construction documents, drawings, and 3D models. Autodesk Takeoff updates files in real time so you can stay on top of the latest versions of everything and work from a single source of truth.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a collaboration software used for document management with visual proofing, real-time collaboration, and Kanban boards.
related_products.features: Wrike is a work management software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Streamline your document management with cloud-based, in-context file storage. Share documents within custom request forms and tasks, shorten your approval cycles with visual proofing, and quickly tag teammates for any file requests. Accelerate your delivery with Wrike's 400+ integrations, including other document management software. Documents are easy-to-find and task discussions and updates can be seen in seconds.

related_products.short_desc: eFileCabinet's advanced workflow automation helps growing organizations limited by repetitive tasks maximize their revenue potential.
related_products.features: eFileCabinet is the ultimate document management solution that empowers HR, Finance, and more to focus on business outcomes. Our cloud-based solution can automate complex document processes that prevent midsize organizations from maximizing their revenue potential. eFileCabinet provides a secure, centralized location for each department to access their confidential data and reduce interdepartmental silos. Streamline your day with eFileCabinet and give 100% of focus to the work that matters.

related_products.short_desc: Sales teams use PandaDoc to improve deal workflow, insights, and speed while delivering an amazing buying experience.
related_products.features:
PandaDoc has empowered sales teams to improve deal workflow, insights, and speed while delivering an amazing buying experience.

Over 40,000 customers use PandaDocs all-in-one document automation software to streamline the process to create, approve, and eSign proposals, quotes, and contracts.  PandaDoc helps you simplify processes and increase efficiency across the entire organization when you integrate your existing CRM, payment, and file storage apps into a single workflow.

related_products.short_desc: Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams.
related_products.features:
Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams. We help teams share their core processes, then transform them into powerful no-code workflows.

Start with employee onboarding to set up new hires for success, then build all sorts of workflows like employee onboarding, client onboarding, and tenant screening.

Manage your team wiki and company handbook 100% free.

Join Salesforce, Colliers, Drift, and 3,000+ other businesses who use Process Street today.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is a free document management platform used by over 8 million businesses worldwide. Available in cloud and on-premise.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is a free document management platform used by over 8 million businesses worldwide. Available in cloud and on-premise (open source code access). Personal, group and company drive, file sync, file sharing, mobile access, online and offline document editing, multiuser editing, more.

similar_products.short_desc: DocuPhase simplifies document scanning, storage, retrieval, and archival processes for small to enterprise organizations.
similar_products.features:
DocuPhase's document management solution is ideal for organizations of all sizes, from small to enterprise organizations.

DocuPhase simplifies document scanning, storage, retrieval, and archival processes and is highly configurable to create the ideal solution for your company's unique needs. 

Eliminate repetitive tasks, digitize your archival and retrieval processes, and eliminate manual tasks that often involve time-consuming bottlenecks and paper shuffling.

similar_products.features: eFileCabinet is the ultimate document management solution that empowers HR, Finance, and more to focus on business outcomes. similar_products.short_desc: Manage, share, and collaborate on business files. Offers granular control of data, role-based permissions and mobile access.
similar_products.features: Onehub is the best way to manage, share and collaborate on business files. Designed for business needs, Onehub offers granular control of data, role-based permissions and mobile access. The Onehub platform is intuitive and easy to use, so customers can begin controlled sharing of documents in minutes. Onehub's proven solution is used by more than one million users worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Engineering content management solution that enables flexible revision management and workflow support for projects & single documents.
similar_products.features: Engineering content management solution that enables flexible revision management and workflow support for projects & single documents.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho WorkDrive is secure document management software empowering modern teams to store, edit, share, and manage documents from a centra
similar_products.features: Create a central team workspace and cloud library for your entire organization with Zoho WorkDrive. Assign role-based access to your team members and enable them to store, share, and collaborate on documents securely. WorkDrive's modern interface offers a built-in office suite and advanced data security and management capabilities.

similar_products.short_desc: Conga's document generation software ensures creation, delivery, and storage of documents, driving revenue success and growth.
similar_products.features:
Conga document generation solutions are the go-to for creating beautiful, accurate digital documents using pre-built or customized templates auto-populated with data from Salesforce. Send consistent and personalized documents that elevate your brand and delight your customers.

No matter your industry, your role, or your use case, Conga document generation makes it easy to quickly generate error-free documents and automate processes. Get rid of process roadblocks to accelerate business revenue.

similar_products.short_desc: Practice management for accountants with expense tracking, staff time reporting, cash receipts handling, and client management tools.
similar_products.features: Time and billing software that offers expense tracking, staff time reporting, cash receipts handling, and client management tools.

similar_products.short_desc: A secure digital environment where your business-critical documents live, and your important processes can be optimized & automated.
similar_products.features:
ICM's ViewCenter is a secure digital environment where your business-critical documents live, and your important processes can be optimized. Get a quick ROI with powerful search functions, secure file sharing, compliance, tasks & alerts, electronic forms, scanning/data capture, integrations, and so much more.

Whether a small business or large corporation, ViewCenter is cost-effective and scalable...ICM's Customer Success Team will find the right solution for YOUR digital transformation goals.

similar_products.short_desc: OM Plus Delivery Manager is an advanced, intelligent print spooler management software.
similar_products.features: OM Plus Delivery Manager is an advanced, intelligent print management software. Delivery Manager seamlessly ingests jobs from multiple systems and delivers them to printers, multi-function devices, fax software, email systems, and more. Rarely changes are needed to existing ERP/EMR systems. OM Plus print spooler management software features include print confirmation, re-printing, re-routing, automated failover, load balancing, bundling, re-sequencing, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: SimpleFile is a mobile-app software solution that enables attorneys and clients to communicate better, review files faster, and more.
similar_products.features: SimpleFile simplifies the attorney, client relationship. It's the first-of-its-kind mobile app for attorneys and legal professionals to use with their clients. It simplifies communication and helps you manage your cases from anywhere. It's the fastest, most effective way to inform your clients of their case status, files, updates and more. You'll never have to chase down client emails, text messages or take unnecessary calls. Everything is right in the app.

similar_products.features: With monday.com Work OS you can create, store, and manage all documents and forms in one place. Automate document creation and approvals to increase efficiency and minimize error, share and collaborate on documents in real-time, and maximize security by centralizing them in one place. Track and review past edits through document search, and standardize document processes to keep everyone on your team on the same page. monday allows for efficient document management, in a collaborative workspace.

similar_products.short_desc: Switch on document management for legal professionals with Thomson Reuters? HighQ.
similar_products.features: HighQ's modern, adaptable, and continuously-learning legal workflow platform delivers an open and scalable foundation, embedded machine intelligence and analytics, and smart integration points with firm-critical applications. Dramatically improve how you plan, organize, track, and complete work more efficiently with personalized client portals and real-time access and insights on legal project work, ready-to-use task lists and templates, and automated workflow-enabled legal process maps.

similar_products.short_desc: A small-business digital filing system to store, find, & manage digital documents, with the best multi-document scanning for the price.
similar_products.features: DigitalDrawer is Windows-based, on-premise, small-business (3-5 users) digital filing software used in various industries, such as retail, manufacturing, realty, finance, education, etc. Businesses use it to electronically and securely store, organize, find, and manage documents. Customers choose DigitalDrawer to keep documents in-house and because of its low price tag, the best Multi-Document Scanning/Importing for the price, robust security, and a full array of document management functions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Digital Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Digital Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Digital Asset Management software automates the management of images and other non-textual materials. Digital Asset Management applications enable powerful, flexible solutions for developing, organizing, and distributing digital assets across multiple office locations and business sectors. These solutions ensure optimal usage for an organization's rich media assets such as advertising pieces, product images, sales collateral, audio, and video files. Digital Asset Management software is related to Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Entity Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Entity Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Entity Management software and related services enable organizations to maintain a searchable and easily accessible repository of records of one or more legal formations under their control.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Forms Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Forms Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Asset Management software provides enterprise wide inventory and life cycle management of software and hardware assets. This can include asset maintenance history, user permissions, acquisition budget forecasting, and software license compliance. This type of software enables IT managers to improve cost control and accurately track IT's business value throughout the organization. IT Asset Management software is related to Compliance software, License Management software, and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Knowledge Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Knowledge Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Knowledge Management software offers ways to optimize the utility of intellectual capital and intangible assets by capturing, preserving and organizing institutional knowledge in a measurable format. Knowledge Management solutions allow successful strategies to be transferred and replicated throughout an organization. Implementation can be inwardly focused on faster learning, new knowledge creation, and innovation or directed outwardly, providing a self-guided service path for customers. Knowledge Management software is related to Business Intelligence software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Document Management software allows legal professionals to organize and quickly access electronically-stored legal documents. Scanning, imaging, and merging allow these documents to be included in a database that is searchable and sortable in any number of ways. This type of software can also allow for transcript and transcription management. Legal Document Management software is related to Document Management software, Legal Case Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Court Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Proposal Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Proposal Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Proposal Management software helps companies manage the proposal and RFP process. Bidders may quickly create strong business proposals and responses to RFPs that are tailored to the needs of each proposal. This software is helpful in automating the more cumbersome aspects of proposal writing while maintaining a detailed and professional-looking document. Some Proposal Management software is also a good fit for companies that are soliciting proposals. In this case, the software helps to organize and evaluate various aspects of multiple proposals at once. Proposal Management software is related to Quoting software, Contract Management software, and Professional Services Automation software.
